title.rendered: Joburg vs Cape Town, South Africa T20 League, 2023: Today’s Match Preview, Fantasy Cricket Team

content.rendered:
We have opted for a fantasy cricket team based on the recent performances, overall impact, and credit points.

Probable XIs

Joburg: Reeza Hendricks, Faf du Plessis (c), Donavon Ferreira, Leus du Plooy, Sibonelo Makhanya, Matthew Wade (wk), Romario Shepherd, Gerald Coetzee, Nandre Burger, Kyle Simmonds, Maheesh Theekshana

Cape Town: Dewald Brevis, Grant Roelofsen (wk), Wesley Marshall, Rassie van der Dussen, George Linde, Tim David, Odean Smith, Sam Curran, Duan Jansen, Rashid Khan (c), Kagiso Rabada

Venue: The Wanderers Stadium, Johannesburg

Pitch Report

(Based on the last 3 games)

1st innings average score: 169

2nd innings average score: 163

Wickets per innings: 6

Type: Good for batting

Wins

Batting 1st: 67%

Batting 2nd: 33%

Fantasy Tips of The Day

With scores of 92, 113*, 37, 51, and 27, Faf du Plessis has featured in the Ultimate Team for 5 consecutive games. In Johannesburg, he has accumulated 760 runs at 51.

Similarly, Reeza Hendricks has enjoyed batting at The Wanderers. He has collected 829 runs at 44, including a century and 6 fifties. His last three scores at the venue read 40, 45, and 45.

When these teams crossed paths earlier in the competition, Dewald Brevis (42 off 34) and Rashid Khan (2 for 18) were the captain and the vice-captain of the Ultimate Team respectively.

Kagiso Rabada has a mixed bag of numbers in the tournament.  He was the Player of the Match (2 for 12) when he last bowled against Joburg but has gone wicketless at the venue on 4 of the last 5 occasions. Overall, he has starred in the Ultimate Team in 4 of 7 games.

Donavon Ferreira has managed only 42 runs in his last 7 innings.

In the last 3 games at the Wanderers, 67% of the wickets have been taken by the seamers. Meanwhile, the spinners accounted for 31%.
